title: TelegraphChat
description: Chat informations are stored in database inside a telegraph_chats table and can be retrieved using DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegaphChat model or using a custom Chat model.

children.value: Chat informations are stored in database inside a
table and can be retrieved using
model or using a custom Chat model.
To customize on your own Chat model, make sure that your custom model extends the

props.code:
<?php

namespace App\Models;

use DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegraphChat as BaseModel;

class Chat extends BaseModel
{

}

children.value: You should specify the class name of your model in the
key of the telegraph config file.
Retrieves the chat data from telegram
Retrieves the chat member count from telegram
Attachments methods only supports required parameters, optional parameters can be sent through Telegraph
call to send a message using html formatting
call to send a message using markdown formatting
call to send a message using markdown V2 formatting
call to edit an attachment's caption
call to edit a media messages with a new media content
call to replace a message keyboard (see
call to remove a message keyboard (see
instructions for creating the database tables
forwards a message from another chat
Tells the chat users that something is happening on the bot's side. The status is set for up to 5 seconds or when a new message is received from the bot.
allows to override Telegram API url on a per-message basis:
generates a new primary invite link for a chat. Any previously generated primary link is revoked. For more info, see telegram
creates an additional invite link for a chat. For more info about options, see telegram
edits an existing invite link for a chat. For more info about options, see telegram
revokes an existing invite link for a chat. For more info, see telegram
set users permissions for a chat. For more info, see telegram
ban a user in a group, a supergroup or a channel. In the case of supergroups and channels, the user will not be able to return to the chat on their own using invite links. For more info, see telegram
//optional, always true for supergroups and channels
unban a user in a group, a supergroup or a channel. For more info, see telegram
restrict a user in a group, a supergroup or a channel from taking the give actions. For more info, see telegram
promotes a user in a group, a supergroup or a channel to administrator status. For more info, see telegram
demote a user in a group, a supergroup or a channel from administrator status.
creates a native poll. For more info, see telegram
creates a quiz. For more info, see telegram

props.code:
/** @var DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegraphChat $telegraphChat */
$telegraphChat->quiz("What's your favourite programming language?")
    ->option('php', correct: true)
    ->option('typescript')
    ->option('rust')
    ->explanation('We all love php, right?')
    ->validUntil(now()->addMinutes(5))
    ->send();

children.value: An animated emoji attachment that will display a random value can be sent through Telegraph
An animation attachment can be sent through Telegraph
A video attachment can be sent through Telegraph
An audio attachment can be sent through Telegraph

props.code:
/** @var DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegraphChat $telegraphChat */
$telegraphChat->setMenuButton()->default()->send(); //restore default 
$telegraphChat->setMenuButton()->commands()->send(); //show bot commands in menu button 
$telegraphChat->setMenuButton()->webApp("Web App", "https://my-web.app")->send(); //show start web app button

children.value: html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}
